alerts.markdown:
Quarterly time series data were published for Inward and Outward Mergers and Acquisitions (M&A) covering source of funding, funds realised and area analysis on 8 December 2015 and 8 March 2016 in error as normally only annual data for these series are published.  While the data published in error is not disclosive as the information is already in the public domain, the series have been removed while ONS undertakes a review of the M&A disclosivity procedure.

The Series CGCQ (total value of inward acquisitions) has also been updated to replace missing data in the historical time series and to update the quarterly estimates for 2015 only, which had not been updated since the 2015 Q3 release on 8 December.

ONS apologises for any inconvenience caused.

####Series affected:

CBAY	M&A : Outward : Number of acquisitions in EU

CBAZ	M&A : Outward : Value of acquisitions in EU : Annual : £m

CBBA	M&A : Outward : Number of acquisitions in USA : Annual

CBBB	M&A : Outward : Value of acquisitions in USA : Annual : £m

CBBJ	M&A : Outward : Number of disposals in EU : Annual

description.title: Mergers and Acquisitions involving UK companies time series dataset
description.summary: Data on the value and number of mergers, acquisitions and disposals involving UK companies with values of £1.0 million or greater.
description.metaDescription: Data on the value and number of mergers, acquisitions and disposals involving UK companies with values of £1.0 million or greater.
